options.name: Demolitionist
options.description: Gain +1 Synthesis and +1 Heat Mitigation. You can craft basic explosive devices.

options.name: Blast Radius
options.description: The area of effect of your explosives increases by 50%. You gain +1 Heat Mitigation.

options.name: Controlled Detonation
options.description: You can choose which targets in the blast radius of your explosives are affected. Gain +1 Synthesis.

options.name: Explosive Expert
options.description: Your explosives deal +1d6 damage. You gain immunity to being knocked prone by explosions.

options.name: Action : Remote Detonation
options.description: Place an explosive device that you can detonate as a bonus action anytime within the next hour.

options.name: Reaction : Defuse
options.description: When you detect an explosive device, you can attempt to disarm it as a reaction with advantage on your check.

options.name: Advanced Explosives
options.description: Your explosives ignore half of the target's relevant damage resistance. Gain +1 Synthesis and +1 Heat Mitigation.

options.name: Action : Breaching Charge
options.description: Place an explosive specifically designed to create openings in structures. It deals triple damage to objects and structures.

options.name: Specialized Payloads
options.description: You can craft explosives with additional effects such as smoke, flashbang, EMP, or corrosive damage.

options.name: Master Demolitionist
options.description: Your explosives deal +2d6 damage. You gain immunity to fire damage and can create a chain reaction with multiple explosives for exponentially increasing damage.
